attributes.action: Push for the abolition of the Euro
attributes.additional_details:
The Euro is a totally flawed idea and ridiculous. It should be orderly dismantled and replaced by a system of various competing European Currencies where the various member states of the EU support each other through a Common Co-existing and Competing policy.

Her Majesty's Government should call and push for the orderly dismantling and abolition of the Euro and the European Central Bank.
